text:
CircleUp - San Francisco & Remote [US]. Hiring full stack engineers & interns. Visa OK

CircleUp is building an online investment marketplace that helps non-tech consumer & retail businesses raise the capital they need to expand. We have been named one of the Top 5 Most Disruptive companies in Finance by CNBC, one of America's Most Promising Companies by Forbes, and one of the 50 Best Fintech Innovators by KPMG. We are backed by top-tier investors including Google Ventures & Union Square Ventures.

Our stack is Python (Django) + AngularJS. We use some exciting applications of Machine Learning in Python.

We are 10 engineers and growing fast. Half the engineering team is in SF, half is remote (distributed across the US). We're looking for smart generalists that like working full stack in a fast-moving environment.

Help us build the future of finance! Apply at: https://circleup.com/jobs/engineer/

More info here: https://circleup.com/

# on our last round of funding http://techcrunch.com/2014/03/26/opening-consumer-products-t...

# success stories about a few companies we have helped http://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/n-y-small-businesses-tur... https://www.nerdwallet.com/blog/tips/small-business-tips/sma...

# article about crowdfunding pioneers. first half of it talks about CircleUp http://www.nytimes.com/2013/01/06/business/crowdfunding-for-...
